heading: This Afternoon
text: Partly cloudy, except mostly to partly cloudy from the Green Mountains into the Champlain Valley. Chance of an early flurry north. Highs in the low to mid 20s north, mid 20s to around 30 in the south. West to northwest winds 5 to 10 mph, gusting to 15 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Partly cloudy south. Mostly cloudy north, with a the chance of snow showers, mainly in the mountains, and in the valleys near the Vermont/Québec border. Lows zero to 10 above, cold spots around 5 below. Northwest 5 to 10 mph and diminishing.

heading: Thursday
text: Becoming mostly sunny in southern valleys. Morning clouds north and in the southern Greens, with any snow showers giving way to breaks of sunshine. Highs from the upper teens to mid 20s. West to northwest winds 5 to 10 mph.
